original_text: But he that received the seed into stony places, the same is he that heareth the word, and anon with joy receiveth it;
korean_text: 돌밭에 뿌려졌다는 것은 말씀을 듣고 즉시 기쁨으로 받되

sentences.original_text: But he that received seed into stony places
same is he that heareth the word
and anon with joy receiveth it
